pr_title: Improve automated sync rate limit error

timeline.message:
Improve automated sync rate limit error

We have a rate limit of 2 minutes per automated sync

The error previously showed "Server busy. Try again later."

Now it shows "Sync Error: An automatic sync may be triggered in %d seconds."

Fixes 6733

timeline.bodyText:
@david-allison-1 @mikehardy
FYI, we don't usually end strings with a period in AnkiDroid unless it consists of multiple sentences.
